attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make August 15th a day of remembrance for all those who suffered and died in Japanese captivity during World War II. The day to be called 'Far East PoW Remembrance Day'.

rejection.details: The title must be a call to action, not the name of your group.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
